definition: there is no knowing what is in a man's heart (idiom)

sentences.english: Pot- bellied pigs make the best pets.
sentences.chinese: 大肚皮猪是最好的宠物。

sentences.english: Belly-painting isgrowing more popular as a baby-shower activity, Thompson says.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森说，作为婴儿淋浴活动，肚皮画越来越受欢迎。

sentences.english: Everywhere he goes, he causes chaos , making his fans split their sides with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 无论他走到哪里都制造混乱，使他的粉丝们笑破肚皮。

sentences.english: This strategy prevents overeating, since you're never ravenously hungry.
sentences.chinese: 少吃多餐可以防止吃太多，因你还没有饿到肚皮贴背。

sentences.english: Learn the Omis technique of Egyptian belly dancing in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 埃及学习肚皮舞Omis在此免费视频舞蹈课技巧。

sentences.english: Learn snake arms in spiritual belly dancing in this free dancing video.
sentences.chinese: 学习肚皮舞蛇的精神武器在这个自由跳舞的视频。

sentences.english: Fair words will not fill the belly.
Misers put their back and their belly into their pockets.
sentences.chinese: 守财奴宁可打赤膊饿肚皮，也舍不得掏腰包。

sentences.english: We report on a patient with segmental rhythmic myoclonus resembling belly dance.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个病人节段性肌阵挛节奏类似肚皮舞。

sentences.english: Frog mother is speaking, belly actually pa split.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙妈妈正说着话，肚皮却啪一声裂开了。

sentences.english: I'm taking flamenco and belly dancing classes.
sentences.chinese: 我要去学佛朗明哥舞和肚皮舞啦。

sentences.english: Spice up the evening by inviting a belly dancer.
sentences.chinese: 通过跳有魅力的肚皮舞来给晚会调味。

sentences.english: Blue Whale my back was light blue, belly full of folds, with ocher color macula.
sentences.chinese: 蓝鲸背脊呈浅蓝色，肚皮布满褶皱，带有赭石色黄斑。

sentences.english: Anyone who drinks beer too much is bound to get a bay window.
sentences.chinese: 喝啤酒太多的人，必然会落得一个大肚皮。

sentences.english: New Fitness Trends Include Zumba, Belly Dancing and Hula Hooping.
sentences.chinese: 新的健身趋势包括尊巴，肚皮舞和呼啦圈运动。

sentences.english: Figure-8 arms in belly dancing requires your fingertips to touch slightly.
sentences.chinese: 图8肚皮舞武器需要你的指尖触摸略。

definition: sound made by an empty stomach
